1.description: Karnak discovers his opponent’s stress points, gaining True Strike for 8.5 seconds. This allows him to ignore Armor, Resistances, and Evasion. True Strike is a passive effect and cannot be nullified or removed.
1.name: Distortion & Focus
1.note: This attack allows Karnak to be become Focused instantly.

2.description: Damage from this attack increases by up to 48% based on how low the opponent’s Health is at the time of impact.
2.name: The Three Worlds

3.description: Karnak Dazes his foes with his strike, reducing their Defensive Ability Accuracy by 80% for 40 seconds.
3.name: Blind Time

gameplay.description:
Buff: Given time to study his opponent, Karnak becomes Focused, gaining 66% Critical Hit Chance. Whenever he is struck, Karnak loses Focus for 9 seconds. 

Resist Physical Passive: Covered in a dense callus, Karnak has toughened his skin and gains 21% increased Physical Resistance.

attack.description: Passive: Every 5 seconds, Karnak reduces his Class Disadvantage by 2% until it’s gone. This only affects the Attack penalty from a class Disadvantage, it does not affect Karnak’s opponent’s Class Advantage.
